alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 19 at 3:52AM CDT until March 20 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 expected. * WHERE...St. John The Baptist, Upper Lafourche, St. Charles, Upper Terrebonne, Lower Jefferson and Central Plaquemines Parishes. * WHEN...From 10 PM Sunday to 10 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; St. John The Baptist; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
